attributes.action: raise Civil Service Pay by at least 3% in 2006 and to ensure that the 2007 Pay Award is paid in full and on time in August 2007.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There have been suggestions by the Rt Hon Gordon Brown MP, that the Civil Service pay award for 2006 should be kept below 2%, i.e. less than the Govt's own inflation figure. This frankly is an insult. Council Tax and Utility Bill have risen in 2006 by at least 8%. Civil Service pay needs to rise by at least 2.7% in 2006, just to allow us to keep up with these rises.
